content: Reckon it's right about time you try to grow a <style=Highlight>snowy cantaloupe</style>! Gran'mama always had some ready when I was lickle. Here, take these <style=Highlight>snowy cantaloupe seeds</style>.
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A期待}And I can't wait to see you hold your own <style=Highlight>Crop Harvest Fair</style> someday... I'd love to admire what you've grown together with everyone else.
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: Well mah, the growin' part takes a lickle longer... Might be <style=Highlight>three whole days</style> before you see any crops. But just imagine, you might even grow some <style=Highlight>giant corn</style>.
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: You could put together a small display of your best harvests and invite folks to come take a look. I've been to a few unique ones before...
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A想象}There's no special secret to growin' <style=Highlight>giant crops</style>. Just <style=Highlight>water</style> 'em, <style=Highlight>water</style> 'em nice 'n' proper, and then keep on <style=Highlight>waterin'</style> 'em every day... That's how you might end up with somethin' big.
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A惊叹}O' Skies Above~! These crops of yours look amazin'! Won't be long before you know every trick in the field.
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A灵光一现}Oh, wait a sec! I got somethin' good to share with you. I told Gran'mama about all the crops we tried growin' on our planet. She didn't say much back, but...
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: {A笑眯眯}She sent me this! Look~! A <style=Highlight>Blueprint: Mutated Crop Harvest Fair</style>. Go on, take it.
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: Well mah, the growin' part takes a lickle longer... Might be <style=Highlight>three whole days</style> before you see any fruit. But just imagine, you might even grow a <style=Highlight>giant snowy cantaloupe</style>.
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3

content: Reckon it's right about time you try to grow some <style=Highlight>corn</style>! It's tasty, fillin', and every part of it's useful. Here, take these <style=Highlight>corn seeds</style>.
info: 种植2阶段-云果_主流程文本3
